entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story, an Auror-in-training.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is a Dark wizard catcher and an Auror who has qualified recently.

entities.name: kingsley
entities.description: Kingsley is a higher-ranking Auror than Tonks.

relationships.description: Harry and Tonks are friends as they have a conversation about being an Auror.
Tonks is subordinate to Kingsley, who is higher-ranking in the Auror office.
